name: STRAIGHT INTO HELL
description:
An infinite fall into a procedurally generated hell.

WASD, arrow keys, or controller joystick to move. Press the esc key in the Windows build to exit the game.

All scripts and assets aside from the font (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-font-thaleah-140059) were created by me using Asesprite, Ableton Live 10, and sfxr.
